name: Pyxel Knight - Engagement Quest
description:
The King has declared,"He who marries another kingdom's princess shall rule the land" Try to win the hearts of the stubborn picky princesses trapped in dangerous dungeons full of dubious enemies, surprising traps, bountiful treasure, frightening bosses and more!

Pyxelaria needs heroes and now it's your chance to shine.

Features:

  1. 1-4 player local co-op (Maybe online play in the future)
  2. 9 worlds and 9 bosses with 50+ enemies to defeat
  3. 8 special equipment to unlock. (Hookshot, Bombs, Lightning rod and more)
  4. Multiple Armors, Weapons and Boots to obtain. (4-5 ish is the plan.)
  5. Collect Heart Shards to extend your life bar and Magic Extension Potions to extend your magic abilities
  6. Player Save file detached from Adventure Save file. (Go on adventures with your friends using your already powered up character)
  7. 24 levels with 8 dungeons filled with puzzles and monsters to face.

Current Version's Features:

1. 1-4 player local co-op

2. 8 world overviews in place

3. 3 special equipment to unlock. (Hookshot, Bombs, and Lightning rod)

4. Single Armor with 2 coming very soon. (Feature is mostly working. Just need to make some art for it)

5. 2 collectible Heart Shards and 1 Magic Extension Potion

6. Player Save file detached from Adventure Save file. (Go on adventures with your friends using your already powered up character)

7. 2 stable levels and 3 experimental levels.

NOTE: Once this game is approved on Steam anyone who purchases here will get a steam key.
